name: 黃子坤
objective: 本課程旨在探討並演練各種分析工具與手段，藉以解析市場產品的功能、使用性、材料與製造、文化與美感，並解析顧客的需求與渴望。在此基礎下，導入產品服務系統(Product Service System)的理論，以更寬廣的視野探討消費者的需求，並以workshop驗證之。
schedule:
Perspective on Product Analysis / methods and case studies
Defining Product Analysis
Tools of Product Analysis
Data requirement of Product Analysis
Product function test and analysis
Product usability test and analysis
Image Board Analysis for Product Attribute
User’s context survey and analysis
User’s Experience 
Service Quality
Service design framework
Product Service System
